Posts.Content: Mysticalbabe21 wrote: i'm 23 and about two years ago i noticed a reddish fluid coming from my right nipple when i squeezed it slightly, i was getting pain in the breast in the morning and noticed a slight lump around the time for my period so i went to the cancer society, the lady gave me a physical examination, asked me when my next period was due and totally ruled out cancer because of my age and told me 'stop playing with your breasts' so i figured it was nothing until the reddish fluid when i check became darker and the lump became bigger and the pain was more persistant also at night the area around the lump would become numb so i mentioned it to my GP on my next visit, he did a physical check and deemed it to be a clusted of tissue in the breast but sent me to get a mamogram just incase, the results came back and Surprise! Surprise it was a lump and big ass one too, now i have to go see a surgeon and 'get it out now' as my GP had urged. this is the thing how many other young girls out there have the same problem and have people looking past it because of their age, i don't know if i have cancer or not but most likely when i have the surgery to get the bomb out my boob and then i'll find out. and it funny cause this could have been avoided if only that lady at the cancer society had just expected the unexpected Bajan girl who loves pink Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Huge lump on my mamogram Mysticalbabe21 smithlme
